commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "name": "cleanconnect-pro-backend",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "description": "CleanConnect Pro Backend API - AI-Powered Airbnb Cleaning Marketplace",
  "main": "src/app.js",
  "scripts": {
    "start": "node src/app.js",
    "dev": "nodemon src/app.js",
    "test": "jest",
    "test:watch": "jest --watch",
    "test:coverage": "jest --coverage",
    "test:integration": "jest --testPathPattern=integration",
    "test:e2e": "jest --testPathPattern=e2e",
    "lint": "eslint src/ tests/",
    "lint:fix": "eslint src/ tests/ --fix",
    "migrate": "node scripts/migrate.js",
    "migrate:create": "node scripts/create-migration.js",
    "migrate:up": "node scripts/migrate-up.js",
    "migrate:down": "node scripts/migrate-down.js",
    "seed": "node scripts/seed.js",
    "db:reset": "node scripts/reset-db.js",
    "db:backup": "node scripts/backup-db.js",
    "worker": "node src/worker.js"
  },
  "dependencies": {
    "express": "^4.18.2",
    "cors": "^2.8.5",
    "helmet": "^7.1.0",
    "morgan": "^1.10.0",
    "compression": "^1.7.4",
    "express-rate-limit": "^7.1.5",
    "express-validator": "^7.0.1",
    "pg": "^8.11.3",
    "redis": "^4.6.10",
    "jsonwebtoken": "^9.0.2",
    "bcryptjs": "^2.4.3",
    "joi": "^17.11.0",
    "winston": "^3.11.0",
    "winston-daily-rotate-file": "^4.7.1",
    "socket.io": "^4.7.4",
    "stripe": "^14.7.0",
    "nodemailer": "^6.9.7",
    "twilio": "^4.19.0",
    "multer": "^2.0.0",
    "sharp": "^0.32.6",
    "uuid": "^9.0.1",
    "moment": "^2.29.4",
    "lodash": "^4.17.21",
    "dotenv": "^16.3.1",
    "express-async-errors": "^3.1.1",
    "http-status-codes": "^2.3.0",
    "node-cron": "^3.0.3",
    "bull": "^4.12.2",
    "ioredis": "^5.3.2"
  },
  "devDependencies": {
    "nodemon": "^3.0.2",
    "jest": "^29.7.0",
    "supertest": "^6.3.3",
    "eslint": "^8.53.0",
    "eslint-config-airbnb-base": "^15.0.0",
    "eslint-plugin-import": "^2.29.0",
    "cross-env": "^7.0.3"
  },
  "jest": {
    "testEnvironment": "node",
    "collectCoverageFrom": [
      "src/**/*.js",
      "!src/app.js",
      "!src/server.js"
    ],
    "coverageDirectory": "coverage",
    "coverageReporters": [
      "text",
      "lcov",
      "html"
    ],
    "testMatch": [
      "**/tests/**/*.test.js",
      "**/tests/**/*.spec.js"
    ]
  }
}
